category.name: Integration.CATIA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CATIA_load_bom_traversal_option
preference.preference_description: Manages the Load level for a selected BOM Line (full depth, selected BOM Line and its direct children, selected BOM Line and its parents). Possible Values : THROUGH : the complete selected sub-assembly is exported, including all parents and all children. All children components of all sub-assemblies are exported recursively. FIRST_LEVEL : all parents and only the first level of its children components are exported. Children components of sub-assemblies are not exported.
